title: 201 - Misunderstanding Paul - With Tim Gombis
description:
Mike talks with Pauline scholar Tim Gombis about how the Apostle Paul is misunderstood in his New Testament writings.
 
Learn more about the VOX Podcast:
www.voxpodcast.com
